beryl_noble_letter.name: Crumpled Letter
beryl_noble_letter.description: A tear-stained letter addressed to Beryl. The handwriting is childish.

elara_medicine_parcel.name: Medicine Parcel
elara_medicine_parcel.description: A package from Elara. Smells faintly of herbs... and something sweeter.

beryl_noble_parcel.name: Noble's Parcel
beryl_noble_parcel.description: A finely wrapped package addressed to a noble in the upper quarter.

raw_meat.name: Raw Meat
raw_meat.description: A chunk of raw meat. Needs cooking.

log.name: Log
log.description: A rough log, needs to be processed.

apple.name: Apple
apple.description: A fresh red apple. Crunchy and sweet.

wooden_plank.name: Wooden Plank
wooden_plank.description: A sturdy plank, ready for construction.

fish_sardine.name: Raw Sardine
fish_sardine.description: A small, oily saltwater fish. Best when cooked.

fish_trout.name: Raw Trout
fish_trout.description: A common freshwater fish. Best when cooked.

fish_pike.name: Raw Pike
fish_pike.description: A large, predatory freshwater fish. Best when cooked.

food_sardine_grilled.name: Grilled Sardine
food_sardine_grilled.description: A sardine, grilled over an open flame. Restores a small amount of hunger.

food_trout_grilled.name: Grilled Trout
food_trout_grilled.description: A trout, grilled over an open flame. Restores a moderate amount of hunger.

food_pike_grilled.name: Grilled Pike
food_pike_grilled.description: A pike, grilled over an open flame. A hearty meal.

axe_basic.name: Old Axe
axe_basic.description: Old but reliable enough for chopping wood.

fishing_rod.name: Wooden Fishing Rod
fishing_rod.description: A basic rod. It smells of fish.

rope.name: Rope
rope.description: Strong hemp rope. Useful for climbing.

beer.name: Beer
beer.description: A mug of frothy beer. Refreshing.

wolf_tooth.name: Wolf Tooth
wolf_tooth.description: A sharp tooth from a wolf.

wolf_pelt.name: Wolf Pelt
wolf_pelt.description: The fur of a forest wolf. Can be used for crafting.

wolf_leather_helmet.name: Wolf Leather Helmet
wolf_leather_helmet.description: A sturdy leather helmet made from wolf hide.

wolf_leather_armor.name: Wolf Leather Armor
wolf_leather_armor.description: Light armor crafted from cured wolf pelts.

wolf_leather_legs.name: Wolf Leather Leggings
wolf_leather_legs.description: Tough leather leggings for agility and protection.

wolf_tooth_amulet.name: Wolf Tooth Amulet
wolf_tooth_amulet.description: A necklace made of wolf teeth. Looks fierce.

iron_helmet.name: Iron Helmet
iron_helmet.description: A heavy iron helmet. Protects your noggin.

iron_chainmail.name: Iron Chainmail
iron_chainmail.description: Standard issue iron chainmail. Reliable protection.

iron_leggings.name: Iron Leggings
iron_leggings.description: Chainmail leggings to protect your legs.

crude_knife.name: Crude Knife
crude_knife.description: A crude, hand-forged knife with a chipped blade.

iron_sword.name: Iron Sword
iron_sword.description: A well-crafted iron sword. Sharp and reliable.

vanessas_charm.name: Vanessa's Charm
vanessas_charm.description: A silver charm shaped like a fox. It feels warm to the touch.

antique_locket.name: Antique Locket
antique_locket.description: An old, tarnished locket containing a faded portrait. Elisa's most prized possession.

prototype_blade.name: Prototype Shadow Blade
prototype_blade.description: A wicked, dark-steel dagger with a hollow hilt. Evidence of illegal weapons manufacturing.
